title: ONTARIO: Arts & crafts fair to fill convention center
text:
STAFF REPORT
Published: Oct. 7, 2015 4:31 p.m. ONTARIO: Arts & crafts fair to fill convention center Print Photo Share Pin It 1 of 3 More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT A wine tasting fundraiser Saturday, Oct. 10 at the Victoria Gardens Cultural Center benefits the Main Street Theatre Company. ERIC RISBERG, , AP FILE PHOTO Related article » The Ontario Convention Center will host an arts and crafts show Friday, Oct. 9 through Sunday.
The Harvest Festival boasts 24,000 hand-made items, a Kidzone, crafting demonstrations and live entertainment. The hours are 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. Friday and Sunday and 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. Sunday.
Admission is $9 for adults, $7 for adults ages 62 and older and $4 for children ages 13 to 17. Children ages 12 and under will be admitted for free.
Admission also is free for the first 100 attendees each day of the show. Attendees who bring a non-perishable food donation will get $2 off their admission price.
The convention center is at 2000 East Convention Center Way, Ontario.
Information: ontariocc.org
Here are some other things going on this weekend:
SATURDAY, OCT. 10 For the Love of Wine, a wine tasting fundraiser, is 7 to 11 p.m. at the Victoria Gardens Cultural Center, 12505 Cultural Center Dr, Rancho Cucamonga. It benefits the Main Street Theatre Company at the Lewis Family Playhouse.
Guests will be able to sample an assortment of high end wines, craft beers and appetizers.
Tickets are $65 each or $125 per couple.
For tickets, call the Lewis Family Playhouse box office at 909-477-2752 or visit lewisfamilyplayhouse.com .
SATURDAY AND SUNDAY The Grove Theatre’s final two performances of “The 39 Step”s are 7:29 p.m. Saturday and 2 p.m. Sunday. The play, produced by Inland Valley Repertory Theatre, is an adaptation of Alfred Hitchcock’s 1935 movie.
Tickets are $20 and $25 and can be purchased by calling 909-920-4343, going to grovetheatre.com or at the box office at The Grove, 276 E. Ninth St., Upland.
The box office is open 11:30 a.m. to 4 p.m. Tuesday to Friday and 11 a.m. to 2 p.m. Saturday:
